review: Got this as a gift for my mother-in-law and she loves it.  Very snappy, no lag on controls.  Voice search is actually pretty impressive and way better than keying something in with a on screen keyboard.  Wish it had Vudu, but prime has overall been impressive in content.

review: Great item!!! Lots of app choices and very easy to operate!!!

review: Amazon Fire TV is awesome!  It was an extremely easy set up and our HD picture quality and sound is so much better with Amazon Fire than it was with our cable provider.  We are enjoying all the TV shows and movies that we missed because these programs were too expensive with our cable company.  I highly recommend Amazon Fire TV.

review: Excellent picture and clarity. The unit plays continuously, very little interruptions, and prime contents are clearly labeled.  Voice activation is helpful and it was easy to set up.
